welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Eschweiler, Germany! Get ready to experience the city's rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Eschweiler has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
